EmailTemplate.name: ASI TnE TW Corp Card Pending to Submit Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Travel & Entertainment Claim form (Corp Card) {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} waiting for submit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.OwnerFullName},
Your Travel & Entertainment Claim form (Corp Card) {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name} has been created but not yet submit. Please complete and submit the form. 您的差旅費申請單(公司卡) {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Name}已產生但尚未提交. 請完成並提交此申請單.
Please click this link {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} to view the Travel & Entertainment form details. 請按此 {!ASI_TnE_ClaimHeader__c.Link} 連結 檢閱差旅費申請單明細
